exceptions.exn: The LHS of AbsRing.ax2 (AbsRing.abs _ _ (opp one)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : AbsRing x : K Unable to unify "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) x" with "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) (AbelianGroup.opp K (AbelianGroup.class K) x)".

original: intros x. unfold abs. unfold opp. rewrite AbsRing.ax2. reflexivity.
